Dougram is more important as a political symbol.[/bq]

topics.body:
UGHHH. . . *brain.sh has frozen* *reboots*
*Reads that shit about Fire Emblem: IF again*
*brain again crashes*

Not to drag drama into this thread, but god people on the internet are fucking stupid.  For those of you that don't know in Fire Emblem: IF there's a bisexual female character that you can get with.  The reason why there's drama about it is that people are defending shitaku by saying bisexuality doesn't exist in order to defend kotaku claiming fire emblem is homophobic.

Congratulations internet; we're so deep into feminism that bisexuality "doesn't exist"
!http://24.media.tumblr.com/29a1640072ea6f31989b39a78a355d91/tumblr_n3zf5mxM0g1txudn8o3_500.gif!
!http://37.media.tumblr.com/ba40d1e4190e9610cf291ced34bb0fbb/tumblr_n3zf5mxM0g1txudn8o4_500.gif!
